name: wifi-deauth-simulator
description: Wi-Fi De-Authentication Simulator - Educational cybersecurity tool

scripts.build: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd express-backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.setup: npm run install:all && npm run setup:env
scripts.setup:env: echo 'Please copy env.example files and configure your environment variables'
